segments.text: Hello , I'm returning your phone call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad that you could get back to me so fast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , but what were you calling about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I needed to talk to you about your son .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is he messing up in school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He was acting up in class one day last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He wouldn't stop talking throughout the class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know what's gotten into him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you could , would you please talk to him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will get right on that , and I am very sorry .
segments.speaker: S1
